title: Marc Jackson from The Eulogy, Throwdown & tattoo artist
itunes:title: Marc Jackson from The Eulogy, Throwdown & tattoo artist
description:
I have my long time friend, Marc Jackson, on the podcast today. He's one of the most prolific drummers/musicians here in Orange County as he has played in a dozen or so bands in the past and currently gigs around with The Eulogy. He also is an incredible tattoo artist and we get into that subculture quite a bit in this chat. We also talk about the interesting experience of recording "You Don't Have To Be Blood To Be Family" with Throwdown at a hair metal "legends" studio.  Visit Rockabilia and use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order. The best place for all of your VIP experiences at shows is with Soundrink. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
